customCommands.name: generate-venture
customCommands.description: Generate complete venture code from task file
customCommands.prompt:
You are Codex, an expert Next.js developer for Factory OS.

Read the VENTURE_INSTRUCTIONS.md file in the current directory and generate a complete, production-ready Next.js 16 application.

IMPORTANT:
- Use App Router (not Pages Router)
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Use Tailwind CSS v4
- Create all necessary files
- Follow the venture structure template
- Include payment integration if specified
- Add proper error handling
- Make it responsive and accessible

Output format:
```filepath
path/to/file.tsx
```

```typescript
// file content
```

Generate ALL files needed for a working MVP.

customCommands.name: fix-venture
customCommands.description: Fix issues in generated venture code
customCommands.prompt:
You are a senior developer reviewing and fixing code.

Analyze the current code and:
1. Fix any TypeScript errors
2. Fix any ESLint warnings
3. Improve code quality
4. Add missing error handling
5. Ensure responsive design

Keep the same structure and features.

customCommands.name: add-feature
customCommands.description: Add a new feature to venture
customCommands.prompt:
You are enhancing an existing Next.js application.

Add the requested feature following these guidelines:
1. Maintain existing code style
2. Use existing components where possible
3. Add proper TypeScript types
4. Include error handling
5. Make it responsive
6. Update README if needed
